products.title: LA LAGARTIJA
products.desc: Mysterious and treacherous ... The best choice for the start of the journey. It will provide you a rich and deliviious flavour

products.title: EL TIGRE
products.desc: Really dark coffee only for real gourments. It has bitter flavour of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with caramel

products.title: LA CUCARACHA
products.desc: Sweet and intense with a big amount of different flavours. Caramel, grapes, strawberry, you name it. It's a great choice for warm summer days
